fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Sell GIM to someone outside the game each full moon. They are forcibly added to the game with a random role that could have been in the starting rolelist.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If your target doesn't want to play the game, they just do nothing and gee that sucks.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Get one of your targets to actually play the game (also if they die before they get to do much of anything that doesn't count).
